system.summary: Create a complex mechanical gadget from scrap metal.

description.value:
Over the course of one or more Rest Actions, you can create one intricate item of clockwork, gadgetry, or otherwise. These can vary and some have special effects.

  • Create Clockwork Toy (1 Scrap Metal, 1 rest): You can create a simple clockwork toy that is no larger than a few inches. You decide what it looks like when you make it, but it always has a small winding key to activate it. The toy does up to two simple actions once wound-up, and can only be wound enough to act for up to 1 minute: 
    • Walk 5 ft forward.
    • Make a clicking or dinging noise.
    • Grab and hold an object less than 1lb in size near it.
    • Activate upon motion instead of winding.
    • Light up like a built-in lighter to cast 5 ft of light.
  • Create Timepiece (2 Scrap Metal, 2 rests): You can create a watch or clock that tells the time.
  • Create Impact Capsule (1 Scrap Metal, 1 rest): You can create a capsule that, when a pin is pulled from it, will explode its contents out into a 10 ft radius around where it next impacts. Contents can be anything that can fit inside a baseball, including liquids like water, oil, or potions without the corrupted or thickened modifiers, smoke or gas canisters, even ball bearings or a letter. Impact Capsules break once activated, with all Scrap Metal used to make it too damaged for reusage.
    • Add Lighting Mechanism (1 Scrap Metal, 1 rest): Once you have created an Impact Capsule, you can add a mechanism to cause a spark upon impact, causing anything flammable inside of it to light on fire.
  • Create Music Box (5 Scrap Metal, 3 rests): You can create a box that, when wound, plays a simple tune. You can create new songs for the box by using an additional 1 Scrap Metal.
